website_summaries.verdict: A decent tire for a good price, but not ideal for serious mountain bikers.
pros: Kevlar layer provides more strength and extra puncture resistance
Good for pavement and packed trails
Able to be folded for easy storage

customer_reviews.title: not kevlar belted
customer_reviews.text: i dont how much Kevlar is in these tires, or where it is but imo they are no more robust than any non kevlar tire. i have seen a Real kevlar belted tire deflect a framing nail. the nail remained in tire, but did not go thru to the tube. these guys? a tiny thorn caused a puncture. well for the price i should have known better.
customer_reviews.author: M.T. Cabeza

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd purchase of this 26" tire over 4 years. Consistent quality. Fits the 26" rim perfectly for 3 bikes used on improved trail riding. About 90 miles/week 6 month's/yr. Easy install, it's a tight fit and needs to be. Let it sit out of the box for a couple hours prior to install to get it's shape. I believe the rubber is softer than some others, perhaps giving it perceived better traction on pavement. When worn, this tire has wear markers, which seem to be nylon threads appearing with ~25% tread remaining.
customer_reviews.author: CajunWon

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY BALD AFTER 400 MILES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good tire while it lasted, which wasn't long. Rubber is super soft and wears down fast; totally bald after 400 mi. (thedidn't visibly wear at all over the same period). Wish I'd spent a little more for a tire that would last the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jaydee

customer_reviews.title: Great road tire
customer_reviews.text: Nice mtn bike tire, quieter than my last ones. I would rate this more for road than any serious dirt biking, though, narrower and less aggressive tread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this user!
customer_reviews.text: The item you get is not what it claims. It says it 26" but you get 24". It claims it builds to protect your tire, but I feel it does nothing. At this point, I think this is False advertising this seller needs to read false advertising laws. He may learn something!
customer_reviews.author: rwmtiger

customer_reviews.title: Nice kevlar bike tires!
customer_reviews.text: like the rounded shape, but does feel a little more squirelly around corners, where more square shaped knobbies feel more stable. tread pattern was NOT same as shown in ad however! the ones i ended up with have holes/or hollow knobbies, NOT solid as shown here!
customer_reviews.author: B. Farsace

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have only put about 40 mostly-road miles on these, but am happy. Smooth ride, good grip, and they seem like they will wear well. The "finish" is not very good, with a lot of those little (mold drain?) thingies hanging off the tire, but those are basically inconsequential as far as I can tell. Will likely buy another of these when I change the back tire soon.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Durable tires.
customer_reviews.text: Really tough durable tires, tire patterns are different than what is being displayed. However, I can't remember getting a flat with these tires. I ride ten miles to work and nine and a half miles from work, five days a week. I had them for a few weeks, before my bicycle was stolen. I would have given five stars, but the pattern shown, is not what I got, so.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the cheapo tires that came with my daughters bike we purchased from Target. Very good quality! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Great tire great price
customer_reviews.text: Just put this on our bike the other night to replace the old one. Great price and great quality! Was very easy to install the tube into the tire, looks like the tire will last for very long time! Will definitely purchase another one for the back tire next year
customer_reviews.author: Monica ann

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought I had the wrong size. ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I had the wrong size.. the way it was wrapped up in the box it was flat and some massaging to get back to original form.. totally get it from a shipping perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money and very good for keeping inflated while going over sharp objects.
customer_reviews.author: vwjunkie01

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not fo serious trail riding.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Bell 26er tires for my grandson's bike we had just built for trail riding.our conditions usually run from hard pack to dry loose. These tires are not wide. They are equal to a 1.9 in width. And They are a bit heavy. But, the price reflects those attributes.
customer_reviews.author: GLF

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a different tread, but I let that ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a different tread, but I let that slide and installed the tires. Just noticed that there's a huge chunk of rubber missing. No idea how it happened or when, but doesn't inspire confidence in the tire quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tarantini

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: These put my daughters bike in shape to tow her two children around town with. She uses a trailer for them and off they go!
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: ... tread is gone fast less than two month a poor
customer_reviews.text: a lot of ride and tire tread is gone fast less than two month a poor tire
customer_reviews.author: Jason L. Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Durability You Can Trust!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tires! Really easy to install and durability you can trust. Good value for money spent like no other. I will buy 2 more to put on my brothers bicycle. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Boudoin

customer_reviews.title: Great tires, great price.
customer_reviews.text: These bike tires were a perfect fit for my lawn cart. They arrived on time and in perfect condition at a super low price. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tabler

customer_reviews.title: ... old Huffy 21 speed mountain/road bike and they are awesome. The tread pattern is exactly like the original
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires for my 20 year old Huffy 21 speed mountain/road bike and they are awesome. The tread pattern is exactly like the original. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike tires.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong tires made with excellent materials and with excellent workmanship. They (I bought two) fitted my bike perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AL G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like my mountain bike may buy one on line my doctor recommended ridding,so their GRT.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seemed really good. Sold the bike shortly after purchase. Did a few rides with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin T Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tire for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire, labeled 26 x 1.95. With the condition of the roads I need this knobby tire on my e-bike (powered front wheel, this tire on back,
customer_reviews.author: paul92107

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good delivery.  Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Good product and good delivery. Happy. Add a little air to get tub in place before final assembly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned when I saw how small the box it came in was. After mounting it the concern left.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Look new and good shape just send it bck kus i got the wrong size

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced, great replacement tire for a mountain bike, teamed with a solid inner tube, we're hoping not to have to fit another one anytime soon!

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and like the puncture resistance
customer_reviews.text: Decent tires for the price. Good grip and like the puncture resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: high quality tires, really take a beating on rough terrain

customer_reviews.title: first time using a rolled up tire. at first ...
customer_reviews.text: first time using a rolled up tire. at first i didnt think it would fix but, once unrolled fix was great
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: What's there to say.... it's a bike tire. Nice tred, fit well rides smoothly enough for an off-road tire.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement bike tire and has worked well since installing!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Those tire's are terrific! They are good for off road biking with pebbles and sand!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tires just like original, fit well, pleased- granddaughter back on the trails again
customer_reviews.author: BettyDora

customer_reviews.title: NOT a whitewall tite
customer_reviews.text: I was fully expecting it to be a white wall tire but it's not, so I may return it or exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is heavier than expected (5lb). I would not go mountain biking with this tire on.
customer_reviews.author: HYUN C.

customer_reviews.title: Good thing to get when you ride.
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my bikes all the time. They always last a about a year or so. So it was time to order more. They were for the wifes bike.
customer_reviews.author: home

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tire, just used for commute, no major stress to test it against.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a great price delivered to my door. What's not to like?

customer_reviews.title: ... PUT THEM ON MY BIKE YET BUT THEY LOOK GREAT!

customer_reviews.text: I ordered two 26" tires and received two 24". No I have to wait another 2 weeks to get tires in the mail.

customer_reviews.text: As described, fit an old Specialized. Great price, saved lots if $$ diying (as opposed to taking to a bike shop).

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires
customer_reviews.text: Great tires but it takes a bit to reshape them onto a tire.

customer_reviews.text: Great price. Took back the one I got from Wal-Mart. This one was about $5 less.

customer_reviews.title: Great tough tires for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great tough tires for the money. I have had no problems with them.

customer_reviews.title: They are tires. Too soon to know if they ...
customer_reviews.text: They are tires. Too soon to know if they are tough enough.

customer_reviews.title: Seem very tough
customer_reviews.text: I ride almost every day to work in the summer (on and off road) and they still look new. They are quite tough and so far they have been great.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires. I like the way they folded in ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice tires. I like the way they folded in the box.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent tires at a good price point. I would recommend and order again.

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap, tire
customer_reviews.text: Nice, strong tire. I used to work at a bike shop and this is definitely a cheaper alternative to what we sold that does the trick well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, nice item
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, shipped promptly and is a good tire for every day use.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not the tread shown here. You are not buying what you see in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: RIDE ON!!!!
customer_reviews.text: very good tire for my use. i don't ride off-road much so have no opinion on that, but a very good tire, very good price, and speedy delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fit on my bike just fine. I'm satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's a tire. It fit on my bike just fine. I'm satisfied with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Bike tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire better than Walmart and cheaper and no hassles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice mountain bike tire. No problems installing on my 26 x 1.95 wheel.

customer_reviews.title: I love I love Kevlar tires
customer_reviews.text: I love I love Kevlar tires. It's Real safety, at a reasonable price. Bell Makes Great tires!

customer_reviews.title: Goathead Shield
customer_reviews.text: Helps with the thorns in the dirt that make a tire go flat

customer_reviews.title: ... burn thru tires and the tires are of very good quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: being that I ride an electric bike with two motors I burn thru tires and the tires are of very good quality at an affordable price

customer_reviews.title: Tread pattern does not match
customer_reviews.text: The tread pattern on the tire I received does not match what is shown in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Got me back on the road. Feel great, fit well, and I couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: no flats yet
customer_reviews.text: have bad luck with tires. get flats while mountain biking more often then I'd have liked. Put this on, have yet to get another. Real solid tire. Treads are almost like an enduro style. Not street, but not off-road either. Which is why i bought it as i use my bike for a little of both. Tire is holding up!
customer_reviews.author: stephen sikorski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These tires are amazing, the hold up well, and they didn't pop or tear on trails at all!
customer_reviews.author: areig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Good price and nice tire for regular usage.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and as described in original packaging
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tire tread was not same as item pictured. However, it was a 26" Bell Mountain Bike Tire.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires. Great price. ;)
customer_reviews.text: Great tires and good traction. Would definitely recommend. Don't listen to those reviews saying they are cheap made in China. Although they are Innova that is just the company and there is still a Bell logo on the tire.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable tire, for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent tire for the price, but mine's already worn (showing the purple wear indicator) after only about 6 months riding. I commute about 100 miles a week, consistently, so maybe that's all it should last? I just don't recall replacing a tire that quick before.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Tread is not as pictured very disappointed I was looking for tread that looked like it would be smoother ride. Then shipping took almost 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: a.m.

customer_reviews.title: I expected better
customer_reviews.text: I got them on OK, but the tires seem to have been molded incorrectly, my rims run true and well balanced, but these frikin tires wobble up and down, the tread is not straight. I got them for my brothers bike, he has a learning handicap, luckily he don't go far. I'm waiting to see if he has any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Rando

customer_reviews.title: I din't feel like it would be grippy enough down the center line
customer_reviews.text: Actual tread design was different from the picture. I din't feel like it would be grippy enough down the center line. Spend a little more if you are beyond leisure flat trail riding.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalofly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 1 star because I received a flat tire within one hour of installing
customer_reviews.author: rj2600

customer_reviews.title: strong tires great product
customer_reviews.text: Love them very durable I put 800 miles on them still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Drew Norman

customer_reviews.title: Weak performance tires
customer_reviews.text: Did not resist thorns on mountain bike path. First day out with these tougher tires with Kevlar seems to have been a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Chuck O

customer_reviews.title: Not the same tire as the picture
customer_reviews.text: Tire is OK, but it's not the tire in the picture. The tire I received was an aggressive directional off road tire. The quality of the tire is good, but just not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Bell Kevlar tires are always good... They're just not great for more than 5000 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Crosbie

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value, went on my rims with no problems and have a quality feel to them
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: I was not a happy rider.
customer_reviews.text: These tires did not have KEVLAR as advertised. I rode over an area with thorns and I had several thorns penetrate both tires and I was walking a couple of miles. I was not a happy rider.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: product is just what I expected. I used to get 2-3 flats average a month, so far after 3 weeks I've had NO flats.
customer_reviews.text: product is just what I expected. I used to get 2-3 flats average a month, so far after 3 weeks I've had NO flats.
customer_reviews.author: Occum

customer_reviews.title: Tires are not the pattern in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these tires, but tires I received were the same tire you can buy at Walmart for a few bucks cheaper. Those tires have low tread and a different pattern.
customer_reviews.author: That Fat Guy Over There

customer_reviews.title: Decent tire
customer_reviews.text: Tread pattern does not match the 20". I bought these for a 3 wheel recumbent and wanted all of the treads to match.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Brown

customer_reviews.title: worst tires ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is not the product requested, but is the same poor quality product I was trying to replace on the poor quality Schwinn bike that is now made in China! This product is not what was pictured on the web site. Tread pattern is not what is shown and is very easy punchered.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very bright lights. I used them for reverse lights and they are impressive. 5+ stars on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bell Sports 7064327 26-Inch Mountain Bike Tire with KEVLAR
product_meta.description: The Bell Mountain Bike Tire features a rugged carbon steel bead and layer of DuPont Kevlar, providing extra protection against flats. Tire folds and unfolds without damage.
feature_bullets: KEVLAR layer provides more strength and extra puncture resistance
Carbon steel bead allows tire to be folded without damage for easy storage
Tall, knobby tread offers superior traction for smooth trail to technical single track riding
